#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#define ll long long

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int r;
	int c;
	int i;
	int j;
	scanf("%d%d",&r,&c);
	vector<vector<ll> >mat(10000);
	ll num;
	for(i = 0;i < r;i++)
	{
		for(j = 0;j < c;j++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&num);
			mat[i].push_back(num);
		}
	}
	int q;
	scanf("%d",&q);
	int r1,c1,r2,c2;
	ll ans;
	while(q--)
	{
		ans = 0;
		scanf("%d%d%d%d",&r1,&c1,&r2,&c2);
		for(i = r1-1;i <= r2-1;i++)
		{
			for(j = c1-1;j <= c2-1;j++)
			{
				ans += mat[i][j];
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
